# Load data

<img src="images/tt_logo.png" width="25%">

- [video on how to reproduce a cool plot](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F4c-rEFfJpQ)
- [Twitter bot collecting visualizations](https://twitter.com/TidyTuesday_Bot)

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
require(tidyverse)

dat_url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/allisonhorst/palmerpenguins/master/inst/extdata/penguins.csv"
dat = read_csv(url(dat_url))
dat = dat %>% drop_na()
head(dat)
```
